<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Contact List">db39784983541a10b3fb7230feaad329</macroponent><name>secondary_info/now_default/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	return [
    {
        "label": "Company",
        "value": {
            "type": "string",
            "value": api.state.selectedContact.company_organization.displayValue
        }
    },
    {
        "label": "Email",
        "value": {
            "type": "string",
            "value": api.state.selectedContact.email.displayValue
        }
    },
    {
        "label": "Phone",
        "value": {
            "type": "string",
            "value": api.state.selectedContact.phone_number.displayValue
        }
    },
    {
        "label": "Date Met",
        "value": {
            "type": "string",
            "value": api.state.selectedContact.date_met.displayValue
        }
    }
  ];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>reece.poulsen</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-26 19:18:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1294d0583d41a10b3fb7230feaad384</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>secondary_info/now_default/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BAM - You & I Builder Live!
